snippet: The nanny, Yoselyn Ortega, accused of killing a 2-year-old and a 6-year-old, remains hospitalized after slashing her own throat, but is expected to be arraigned via video link.
abstract: The nanny, Yoselyn Ortega, accused of killing a 2-year-old and a 6-year-old, remains hospitalized after slashing her own throat, but is expected to be arraigned via video link.

headline.main: Upper West Side Nanny Is Indicted on Murder Charges
